title: How to Start a Fire Without Matches
content: You can use friction (bow drill, hand drill), flint and steel, or a magnifying glass with sunlight. Bow drill: Use a stick, string, board, and socket. Spin fast to create ember, drop onto tinder. Flint and steel: Strike sparks into dry tinder. Sunlight: Focus rays through glass onto dry tinder. Always have backup tinder ready.
